name: Packet Racket
description:
A fun and simple game based on Pong, made with the Godot Engine, using free and open-source software. With one person, we reached beta in one week.

Software Used

  • Godot Engine 2.1.4
  • LMMS & Audacity (audio)
  • GIMP 2 (with the Monokai color palette)

Please make bug reports and suggestions, because I'm still working on the game. :)
